insert into admin_permission (`menu_id`,`key`,`name`,`type`,`describe`,`is_enabled`,`create_time`,`modify_time`) values
(#{item.menuId},#{item.key},#{item.name},#{item.type},#{item.describe},#{item.enabled},#{item.createTime},#{item.createTime})
on duplicate key update `name` = case `key`
when #{item.key} then #{item.name}
else `name` end ,`is_enabled` = case `key`
when #{item.key} then #{item.enabled}
else `is_enabled` end
mapper.select:
SELECT ap.`id`,ap.`menu_id` menuId,ap.`name`,ap.`describe`,ap.`type`, ap.`create_time` createTime,ap.`modify_time` modifyTime FROM admin_user_role aur INNER JOIN admin_role ar ON ar.`id` = aur.`role_id` AND ar.`is_enabled` = 1 INNER JOIN admin_role_permission arp ON arp.`role_id` = aur.`role_id` INNER JOIN admin_permission ap ON ap.`id` = arp.`permission_id` and ap.`is_enabled` = 1 INNER JOIN admin_menu am ON am.`id` = ap.`menu_id` AND am.`is_enabled` = 1 WHERE aur.`admin_id` = #{adminId}
AND ap.`menu_id` = #{menuId}

select `id` ,`key`, `name`,`is_hide_children_in_menu` hideChildrenInMenu,`parent_id` parentId,`path`,`redirect`, `icon`,`is_hide_in_menu` hideInMenu from admin_menu where `is_enabled` = 1 order by `sort` asc,`parent_id` asc, `id` asc

SELECT ap.`id`,ap.`menu_id` menuId,ap.`key`,ap.`name`,ap.`describe`,ap.`type`, ap.`create_time` createTime, ap.`modify_time` modifyTime FROM admin_permission ap INNER JOIN admin_menu am ON am.`id` = ap.`menu_id` AND am.`is_enabled` = 1 where ap.`is_enabled` = 1

select a.`key` from admin_api a inner join admin_permission_api b on b.`api_id` = a.`id` inner join admin_permission c on c.`id` = b.`permission_id` and c.`is_enabled` = 1 where a.`is_enabled` = 1 and b.permission_id in
#{permissionId}

SELECT ap.`id` permissionId, ap.`name` permissionName, ap.`type` permission, ap.`menu_id` menuId, am.`name` menuName, am.`parent_id` menuPageId FROM admin_permission ap INNER JOIN admin_menu am ON am.`id` = ap.`menu_id` and am.`is_enabled` = 1 order by am.`sort` asc, am.`parent_id` asc, ap.`id` desc
select arp.permission_id permissionId from admin_role_permission arp inner join admin_permission ap on ap.id = arp.permission_id where arp.`role_id` = #{roleId} order by arp.`role_id` asc

select a.`id`,a.`menu_id` menuId,b.`name` menuName,b.`path` menuPath,a.`key`,a.`name`, a.`type`,a.`describe`,a.`is_enabled` enabled,a.`create_time` createTime,a.`modify_time` modifyTime from admin_permission a left join admin_menu b on b.`id` = a.`menu_id` where a.`id` = #{id}

select a.`id`,a.`menu_id` menuId,b.`name` menuName,a.`key`,a.`name`, a.`type`,a.`describe`,a.`is_enabled` enabled,a.`create_time` createTime,a.`modify_time` modifyTime from admin_permission a left join admin_menu b on b.`id` = a.`menu_id` where 1
and a.`key` like "%${key}%"
and a.`name` like "%${name}%"
and a.`type` = #{type}
and a.`is_enabled` = 1
and a.`is_enabled` = 0
order by a.`menu_id` asc,a.`id` asc,a.`is_enabled` desc
select `id`,`menu_id` menuId,`key`,`type`,`name`,`is_enabled` enabled,`describe` from admin_permission where `menu_id` = #{menuId}
